subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: David Fay’s 21-year tenure as the head of golf’s governing body has been characterized by an encyclopedic knowledge of the rules, a wry sense of humor and decidedly populist sensibilities.
snippet: David Fay’s 21-year tenure as the head of golf’s governing body has been characterized by an encyclopedic knowledge of the rules, a wry sense of humor and decidedly populist sensibilities.
